item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hey there! 👋 I’m Christian Victor, a 19-year-old cybersecurity enthusiast from Nigeria, currently living in Łódź, Poland. Right now, I’m officially a management student at AHE University—because who doesn’t need to manage something? But let’s be real, my heart is all about the thrill of cybersecurity. My Journey Into Hacking The love for hacking? It started young. I was the kid who set up the family WiFi… and then tried to hack it.
